page_content:
Hi, I am Wildsky

Who I am

Currently I am a software engineer in Taiwan AILabs , and I am one of keyholders in Mozilla Taiwan Community.

If you are interested, you could find my projects in this page:http://blog.wildsky.cc/experiences

What I like

I like rap & RnB music.

I like joke, and I plan to build a website for it.

Connect

You could find my via:

  • Email : wildsky+blog at moztw.org
  • Twitter : https://twitter.com/wildskyf
  • Github : https://github.com/wildskyf
  • LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/wildsky

The name of this site

WS = abbr. of Wildsky. Meanwhile, ws:// is the protocol for web socket.

This name is wish you and me could keep in touch, just like web socket. 🙂
